introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to create a Lambda Function URL for a Lambda function. You can use Function URLs to create a a dedicated HTTP(S) endpoint for your Lambda function. Use the FunctionEndpointURL when testing your Lambda function.

bullets.text: Creating and managing Lambda function URLs
Announcing AWS Lambda Function URLs: Built-in HTTPS Endpoints for Single-Function Microservices

text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Rohan Mehta
authors.bio: Associated Cloud Application Architect at AWS Professional Services
